actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-139.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1777) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989 for the Department of State, the United States Information Agency, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1777 (Department of State and United States Information Agency funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1777) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989 for the Department of State, the United States Information Agency, and for other purposes.
